headline: Sunrise Energy Metals (ASX:SRL) Secures Lockheed Scandium Deal Is Its Aerospace Strategy Taking Shape?
summary: In 2025, Sunrise Energy Metals secured a scandium supply agreement for its Syerston Project, giving Lockheed Martin an option to purchase scandium oxide annually for five years. This partnership underscores the potential importance of Syerston’s large scandium resource to high-value aerospace and electronics applications over the long term. With this new scandium supply agreement in place, we’ll explore how Lockheed Martin’s involvement influences Sunrise Energy Metals’ investment...
